===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[museum]] {{zh-mw|m:家|間}}
#: {{zh-x|海洋 博物館|maritime '''museum'''}}

====Usage notes====
Though {{zh-l|博物館}} and {{zh-l|博物院}} are both translated into English as "museum", it should be noted that the former refers to a museum of any size, while the latter is usually reserved for museums built to a large scale.

====Synonyms====
* {{zh-l|博物院}}
